features: Merrow stitch seam construction reduces seam size
Womens' specific design for optimal fit and performance
Gusseted, built-in boxer liner gives comfortable support, comfortable next-to-skin
PowerStretch mesh waistband for support and breathability
Side slits allow ease of movement
Right thigh of boxer liner has phone pocket with media port
Reflective elements increase visibility in low light
Crystalis™—87% polyester, 13% elastane. Lightweight, breathable, four-way stretch textile.
